page.title: 15NURSING OLD PEOPLE LIMAVADY
page.content: Rush Hall is a{private nursing home, situated on Broighter Road in Limavady. Rush Hall was first opened in February, 1984. At the minute there are 27 residents living there. The majority of people staying in Rush Hall are female. The eldest member is Mrs Austin who is 102. Most of the residents use wheelchairs which are supplied by the {National Health. Every facility is provided to make the residents feel at home. They all have their own room with a television, telephone and a private bathroom. The matron of Rush Hall is Mrs D Cheshire. She has been living in this area for sixteen years. Mrs Cheshire moved from Belfast to work in Rush Hall. Rush Hall has beautiful surrounding gardens and a large indoor aquarium.
